hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
FOR /F "TOKENS=1 eol=/ DELIMS=/ " %%A IN ('DATE/T') DO SET dd=%%A FOR /F "TOKENS=1,2 eol=/ DELIMS=/ " %%A IN ('DATE/T') DO SET mm=%%B FOR /F "TOKENS=1,2,3 eol=/ DELIMS=/ " %%A IN ('DATE/T') DO SET yyyy=%%C SET todaysdate=%yyyy%%mm%%dd% echo %dd% echo %mm% echo %yyyy% echo %todaysdate%
call "%VS90COMNTOOLS%vcvars32.bat" cd "C:\Jenkins\jobs\Libtorrent-RC_1_0\workspace" set INCLUDE=C:\Build-OpenSSL-VC-32\include;%INCLUDE% set LIB=C:\Build-OpenSSL-VC-32\lib;%LIB% set BOOST_ROOT=C:\boost_1_59_0 set BOOST_BUILD_PATH=%BOOST_ROOT% set PATH=%BOOST_ROOT%;C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0\VC\bin;%PATH%
cd "C:\Jenkins\jobs\Libtorrent-RC_1_0\workspace\bindings\python"
b2 boost=source libtorrent-link=static boost-link=static release toolset=msvc-9.0 optimization=space runtime-link=static encryption=openssl
copy /y C:\Jenkins\jobs\Libtorrent-RC_1_0\workspace\bindings\python\bin\msvc-9.0\release\boost-source\encryption-openssl\libtorrent-link-static\optimization-space\runtime-link-static\libtorrent.pyd C:\libtorrent\builds\RC_1_0\libtorrent-%GIT_COMMIT%-%todaysdate%.pyd
copy /y C:\Jenkins\jobs\Libtorrent-RC_1_0\workspace\bindings\python\bin\msvc-9.0\release\boost-source\encryption-openssl\libtorrent-link-static\optimization-space\runtime-link-static\libtorrent.pyd C:\Python27\Lib\site-packages\libtorrent.pyd
